title: Don’t Let Putin off the Hook in Ukraine
sub_head: All deterrence, no rewards should be the West’s strategy.
body:
Invading and occupying Ukraine would be such a loser for Russia, so unrewarding, that I’ve had my doubts about the Kremlin-orchestrated circus of recent weeks.
That said, I’m also the guy who likenedVladimir Putin to Saddam Hussein 17 years ago, and has expected some monumental miscalculation on his part ever since.
